mapper.update: update play set play_id = #{playId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, play_time = #{playTime,jdbcType=DATE}, lan_type = #{lanType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, room_id = #{roomId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, room_name = #{roomName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, film_id = #{filmId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, film_name = #{filmName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, play_id, play_time, lan_type, price, room_id, room_name, film_id, film_name from play
